text: Insulasaurus is a genus of skinks. They are all endemic to the Philippines. ==Species== The following four species, listed alphabetically by specific name, are recognized as being valid: *Insulasaurus arborens (Taylor, 1917) *Insulasaurus traanorum (Linkem, Diesmos & Brown, 2010) *Insulasaurus victoria (Brown & Alcala, 1980) *Insulasaurus wrighti Taylor, 1925 Nota bene: A binomial authority in parentheses indicates that the species was originally described in a genus other than Insulasaurus. ==References== Category:Lizard genera Category:Endemic fauna of the Philippines Category:Taxa named by Edward Harrison Taylor
title: Insulasaurus
